name: Harry Potter Tumblr  Dashboard Icons
description: Text, Photo, Link, etc. tumblr icons: Harry Potter themed.
additional_info: Changes your Tumblr dashboard icons into Harry's glasses, Hedwig, a snitch, The Sorting Hat, Dobby, The Deathly Hallows, and a Dementor. Icons are in the same color format as the original Tumblr Icons, with the exception of Hedwig.

discussions.name: Tumblr's icons overlap the custom icons
